author: Abbie

review: I love to stream Netflix and pictures. AirPlay is a blast and so easy. Setup was fine. Quick and easy, as anything should be. The system was WAY smaller than I expected, awesome bonus. The only thing I don't like is I would have to pay monthly to use my music. I am going to buy the next generation when it comes out. I am hoping I can plug my TV into it, and use it more. Still a great buy and perfect for family TVs or personal use.

review: great replacement option for cable. I don't subscribe to much else other than netflix, but i mostly got it for the airplay! I kissed comcast good-bye for the most part!

review: I researched all the different platforms to get Netflix and other things onto my not smart tv. The reason I chose the Apple TV over the others is because it is the only one that I can watch the movies I have on a hard drive on my tv. I do have other apple products but am not an "apple fanboy" per say. I buy products that work for the intended purpose after lots of research.
